title: Paramount Settles Trump's 60 Minutes Lawsuit for $16 Million
summary: Paramount Global agreed to pay $16 million to President Donald Trump's presidential library to settle a lawsuit over a '60 Minutes' pre-election interview with Kamala Harris. The settlement includes no apology and appears to be strategically timed to support Paramount's pending merger with Skydance Media.

sources.title: Paramount agrees to pay $16 million to settle Trump's CBS lawsuit
Paramount settles Trump's '60 Minutes' lawsuit with $16 million payout and no apology
